Name: Southside
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
10 ml Thomas Henry Soda Water optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker (just to bruise).
Add next 4 ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
TOP with a splash of chilled soda from a bottle/can or just the merest squirt from a chilled soda siphon.
Review: Gin and mint with a splash of lime. If you like a Mojito and you like gin, then you'll also like the Southside.
History: The cocktail (straight-up) version of the vintage South Side Fizz .
